name: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Destination
desc: Values that affect how the framework handles navigation across different textual boundaries during a selection.

items.name: case character
items.desc: The selection moves to the next extended grapheme cluster boundary.

items.name: case word
items.desc: The selection moves to the next word boundary ignoring punctuation, whitespace, and format characters preceding the next word.

items.name: case line
items.desc: The selection moves to the next line boundary.

items.name: case sentence
items.desc: The selection moves to the next sentence boundary, ignoring punctuation, whitespace, and format characters preceding the next sentence.

items.name: case paragraph
items.desc: The selection moves to the next paragraph boundary, ignoring the end of line elastic characters and paragraph separators.

items.name: case container
items.desc: The selection moves to the next container or page boundary after boundary of the current container, ignoring the end of line elastic characters.

items.name: case document
items.desc: The selection moves to the document boundary.
